fields.name: action_id
fields.description: AT and a two-digit number (leading zeros)

fields.name: action_name
fields.description: verb for an action describing a wider act of reading: circulate, steal, buy

fields.name: created
fields.description: structural entry creation date of entry

fields.name: created_by
fields.description: structural entry acronym of project member creating entry

fields.name: last_modified_by
fields.description: structural entry acronym of project member last modifying entry
